definition: an offering of a tenth part of some personal income, pay a tenth of one's income, especially to the church
details:
noun
- an offering of a tenth part of some personal income
- a levy of one tenth of something
verb
- pay a tenth of one's income, especially to the church
= example: pay a tenth of one's income, especially to the church
- pay one tenth of
= example: pay one tenth of
- levy a tithe on (produce or a crop)
= example: levy a tithe on (produce or a crop)
- exact a tithe from
= example: exact a tithe from
